# Description

**Short Description:** `r params$short_description`

**Long Description:** `r params$long_description`

[**Click here**](`r params$url`) for more information about this variable.

# Descriptive statistics

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# packages
library(pander)
library(ggplot2)

# Get the column name dynamically
variable_data <- params$data[[params$variable_name]]

# Summary Statistics
pander(summary(variable_data))

# Histogram (if numeric) or barplot (if categorical)
if (is.numeric(variable_data)) {
  ggplot(params$data, aes(x = variable_data)) +
    geom_density(alpha = 0.2, fill = 'steelblue') +
    theme_minimal()
} else {
  ggplot(params$data, aes(x = variable_data)) +
    geom_bar(fill = 'steelblue') +
    theme_minimal()
}
```
